title: 'Good'
body: 'Well
column5: am an working professional and bachelor
column6: on that staying in a rented apartment. So i was looking for a convinient way of having a sofa that can be used as bed as well and at the budget friendly price point where i get a decent quality. Here it is! I am little satisfied with the product as i felt the custioning could have been little more. But on the other hand the price i paid and the feature i am getting very well serves my purpose. So wont compain much. All in all a worth investment. At the same time what i liked the most is each section has a chain so in future if i feel the foam is little saggy i can change it that increases the life of this product. Also the fabric no doubt about it its a good quality one. No reduction is starts for that ðŸ˜…. I kind of loved this purchase.'

title: 'Value for money - comfy to sleep on!'
body: I am very happy with this sofa cum bed. It is firm and comfortable to sit on, very comfortable to use as a bed. The only issue i feel that could be a problem for some is that the cloth bunches up a little at some points..  It isn't very heavy, making it easy to move around when cleaning up or shifting homes.  The delivery was swift and convenient.  Another plus point is - there are so many color options available.
